Sample Audio Files for Gesture-Flow DJ
======================================

Place your audio loop files here:
- drums.mp3 (or .wav)
- bass.mp3
- synth.mp3
- fx.mp3
- melody.mp3

Requirements:
- Format: MP3 or WAV
- Length: 2 or 4 bars at 120 BPM
- Recommended: 16-bit, 44.1kHz or 48kHz

You can generate sample loops using:
1. Google AI Studio (Lyria): https://aistudio.google.com
2. Free loop libraries
3. Any DAW (export 2-4 bar loops)
